Antonio Baltazar

Cloud Architect / DevOps Engineer / SRE / Developer

Automation obsessed, dynamic and detail-oriented DevOps Engineer with a proven track record of collaborating with developers and IT staff to ensure the success of code releases and maximize productivity. Extensive experience supporting on-premise, cloud, and hybrid infrastructures. Highly skilled in architecting scalable web system infrastructures.
